TEXT: The result of a foolish experiment to harness the powers of the Ancients. NL Uses its mutant powers to fuel its primal rage.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~mutated~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~

#p~SILENCE.~ NL NL Then... Machinery whirrs to life again. Needles scrape, bones crack and blood pours by the gallons. You are drained, boiled, seared from the inside out. Eyes burst, regrow, removed, never optimal enough, never perfect. They've brought you to the brink of death and back so many times, and for what? NL NL The pain stops. Something is happening. Fire and shrapnel erupt around you as the machines are smashed and pilfered. Your shackles shatter. You are untethered now, free to witness the sight of your experimenters struggling against these unknown attackers, the ones who inadvertently put an end to your confinement. NL NL As your taloned appendages quake, you feel a new hunger...
